questions.explanation:
Gene Wilder.

	Gene Wilder is also credited as a writer and the director of this film.

questions.text: What was the name of Pfister's wife who was also the maid?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Ann Way portrayed the character of Rachel.  She had a successful British television career, and she is remembered for her role of Dodo Mackintosh in "Rumpole and the Bailey."

questions.text: Larry Abbott and Vickie Pearle were already married when they arrived at the castle for their honeymoon.
questions.explanation:
False.

	They were going to the castle to be with family and friends for their wedding ceremony.

questions.text: What was the name of the radio company that Larry and Vickie worked for?
questions.explanation:
Manhattan Mystery Theater.

	This can be heard when the announcer of the program is talking within the first few minutes of the film.

questions.text: Which family member did cousin Francis like to dress up as?
questions.explanation:
Kate.

	Cousin Francis was murdered by the werewolf by mistake, because he was dressed like Aunt Kate.  It seems Francis liked to wear women's clothes.

questions.text: What was the name of the song that Aunt Kate and Vickie did a dance to after dinner?
Which cartoon character did Vickie do a hand shadow puppet of on the wall in her bedroom?
questions.explanation:
Donald Duck.

	She did the hand puppet and got a little kiss from Donald.

questions.text: How many vases are there in the world like the one in the Abbott mansion?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Aunt Kate said that it cost her $5,000.

questions.text: What was the name of the family's dog?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Rachel yelled at Toby to be quiet several times.

questions.text: What was the name of Larry's ex-girlfriend who also happened to be Charles' current girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Sylvia.

	Sylvia still had the hots for Larry; she just couldn't seem to leave him alone.

questions.text: What was the color of Charles' girlfriend's lipstick that was all over Larry's face?
questions.explanation:
Pink Passion.

	Vickie told her to quit passing it around.

questions.text: What was the profession of Susan Abbott's husband, Montego?
questions.explanation:
Magician.

	Montego helped his wife's family set up the pranks around the house to help scare Larry, so that they could cure him from being afraid.

questions.text: How many films did Gene Wilder and Gilda Radner star in together during their careers?
questions.explanation:
4.

	Gene and Gilda were in "Blazing Saddles", even though Gilda had an uncredited appearance in the film.  They also starred together in "Hanky Panky", "The Woman in Red", and of course "Haunted Honeymoon."

questions.text: Which portly actor portrays Aunt Kate?
questions.explanation:
Dom DeLuise.

	Dom has appeared in almost 100 television and film projects.  He is also noted as a good chef.

questions.text: Which family member was trying to kill Kate and Larry?
questions.explanation:
Charles.

	Johnathon Pryce plays Charles.  He wants to kill them so he can get the inheritance money.
